00010 ObsWindowTransform::ObsWindowTransform(Controller* controller,
00011                            size_t maxHistory,
00012                            size_t numRows, // = obs_dim,
00013                            size_t numCols,
00014                            size_t agents
00015                            ) : 
00016     TransformController(controller) {
00017 
00018 
00019     this->maxHistory = maxHistory;
00020     this->numRows = numRows;
00021     this->numCols = numCols;
00022     this->agents = agents;
00023     
00024     history.init(numRows*maxHistory,
00025                  numCols,
00026                  agents,
00027                  1  // History doesn't need to know the action dimension
00028                  );
00029     history.getFeatures().clear();
00030 }

00033 void ObsWindowTransform::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action, bool computeGrad) {
00034     
00035     // This observation window code can't handle multi-agent obs.
00036     assert(obs.getAgent() == 0);
00037     history.setAgent(obs.getAgent());
00038     history.getEligible() = obs.getEligible();
00039 
00040     // Translate the history
00041     project( history.getFeatures(),
00042              range(0, numRows*(maxHistory-1)),
00043              range(0,numCols) )
00044         = project( history.getFeatures(),
00045                    range(numRows, numRows*maxHistory),
00046                    range(0 ,numCols) );
00047 
00048     // Append most recent history.
00049     project( history.getFeatures(),
00050              range(numRows*(maxHistory-1), numRows*maxHistory),
00051              range(0,numCols) )
00052         = obs.getFeatures();
00053     
00054     /*cerr<<" "<<endl;
00055       cerr<<obs.features<<endl;*/
00056     //cerr<<"obsWindow="<<history.features<<endl;
00057     
00058     try {
00059         controller->getAction(history, action, computeGrad);
00060     } catch (std::exception& e) {
00061         //cout<<"history: "<<history.features<<endl;
00062         throw e;
00063     }
00064 
00065 }
00066 }
